reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars XXL - Comfortable Great Jean
reviews.reviewText: Great Jean. Great fit. I have to wiggle a little getting them on but once on.. LOVE THEM. wish there was about an extra inch higher on the waistline to pull in all my belly fat but does a pretty good job as is. They are not tight on my mid calf, like most jeans, with these, the boot-cut flair starts just above the knee giving you that perfect fit. Looks AMAZING with cowgirl boots, work-boots & just tennis shoes. Perfect length for me. I'm 5'3.5" about 200 with lots of momma belly & a saggy butt. These hide it all very well. Very comfortable & doesn't cut off any circulation when bending or sitting. I tried those flamingal jeans and they were same size but fit terribly. This brand will definitely be my go to from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Jeans!!!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love , love , love these jeans!!! I first read a lot of reviews to judge my size because these jeans run in small , medium, large , etc.. I am 5’5 , and weigh around 163 lbs. My average size is 7/8. The sizing said I’d probably be a large. I ordered a large, and I felt they were too big. I then ordered a medium. They fit very good. They did get a little loose after wearing them a full day. I’m hoping after a good hot wash and dry.. they’ll shrink a little. Over all… 🥰 I’ve since ordered two more pairs. These are definitely my favorite jeans !!! They are a must have!! You won’t regret the comfort of the spandex feel. Order Yours Now!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Jeans looks really nice, great value for price, form fitting, size runs small order up a size from normal, quality good, dryer great know wrinkles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No tummy control
reviews.reviewText: If you have even a little tummy, you'll want to wear a tunic or cover shirt. They have no tummy control. Pants will be great for someone who has less than an hourglass figure or a belt will likely need to be worn. The waist / hip ratio is closer than most women's pants. The denim quality seems to be okay, plenty of stretch. Most reviews are saying size up, however, I could have sized down with the amount of stretch. Length of the pants are fine for walking shoes or low heel boot. I'm 5'3'', 185 lbs and I carry most of my weight in my thighs and bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These jeans are outstanding!
reviews.reviewText: Fit true to size! Extremely comfortable and really cute with my high boots! I am going to order more when I can afford to! I give them a 10/10!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are amazing
reviews.reviewText: So I did NOT want to buy a pair of jeans from Amazon. Not because it’s Amazon, but because I had no idea who these were even coming from. I thought they’d be cheap, Ill fitting, etc. I’m 61, 5’5”, 180. Big through hip/thigh. Nothing ever truly fits. Inseam ALWAYS too long. But I looked at NUMEROUS comments and it kind of seemed like these might be good DUE to the above reasons. I don’t really wear heels but do wear boots and low heels. These are amazing. I threw them into my suitcase as I was about to take a trip - without trying them on because they arrived the day before I left. was going to a football game and had a look planned out and this could have ruined it. I love these jeans. They were slightly snug (I got XL) but relaxed a tad, but not super stretched out to where I grew uncomfortable. They are a little loose in the waist but an elastic belt fixed that easily. Everything is loose in the waist with my body type. My alterations lady will nip them in about an inch or so and they’ll be perfect. I didn’t mind the pockets, they were a bit nostalgic for me. One of the best pair of jeans I’ve ever owned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy! And very stylish love mine.
reviews.reviewText: It’s always hard to find pants that fit well and are comfy. These do that, and are so easy to wear with slight stretch. I just got them and have worn them once. But overall so far 5 stars, we will see how long they last. If I was to change anything about them I would make the butt a touch bigger. I don’t have a big butt however the back of the jeans do dip down with a more flat butt style of cut. The front fits and sits perfectly. Overall even with needing a belt to keep the back in place I still give them the 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love These Jeans!
reviews.reviewText: These are super comfy! I worry when buying clothes online but with Amazon, I dont. You can return just about anything, easily. These fit true to size for me. I'm 5'6 117 lbs. My waist is 28, hips 36. The size small fit me perfect. They feel great on, soft, not that over tight feeling, has stretch in them. I'll wash in cold and no heat, so not to shrink them. The inseam, 31" is perfect for tennis shoes, ok with boots but maybe a little short for what I like for boots. I like 32" - 33" for mine.
I haven’t owned a pair of boot cut jeans in years and was so impressed by these ones they fit like a glove and are true to size. Great purchase

I originally ordered Large. I’m 5’5” 155 lbs. They were tight. Ordered X-LARGE. Fit ok but a little loose in hips. After wearing a couple hours had to keep pulling up. Wished I had returned, but had already washed
Only 5’2” and they were great length with cowboy boots. Soft with a little stretch making them very comfy. Will be getting a black pair!

reviews.reviewTitle: Sizing more like a child's than a women's
reviews.reviewText: Window for return wasn't even 30 days. Sized very small.
